<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>

     <style>
    body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: linear-gradient( to right, rgb(248, 20, 96), white) }
    header, footer { background: #131315; color: white; padding: 1em; text-align: center; }
    nav { background: #e9b0f8; padding: 0.5em; text-align: center; }
    nav a { color: white; margin: 0 1em; text-decoration: none; }
    main { padding: 1em; }
    section, article, aside { margin-bottom: 1.5em; }
    video, audio { width: 100%; max-width: 500px; }
    form { background: #f9f9f9; padding: 1em; border: 1px solid #ccc; }
    label { display: block; margin-top: 1em; }
  </style>

</head>
<body>
    <!-- //Goal TO create Webapage For Global Tech Submiit -->

    <!--1. Header -->
    <header>
       <h1>Future Web 2025</h1>
       <p>Global Tech Conference for web Development</p>
    </header>

    <nav>
        <a href="#">About</a>
        <a href="#">Contact Us</a>
        <a href="#">Support</a>
    </nav>

    <section id="about">
   <h2>About The Event</h2>
   <p>Join Us and Dive into Tech World</p>
   <video controls autoplay muted loop>
    <source src="./3125427-uhd_3840_2160_25fps.mp4" type="video/mp4">
   </video>
    </section>


       <section id="about">
   <h2>Abdull</h2>
   <p>AI research Enginner</p>
   <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," >

    </section>

    <h2>Event Audio In Submmit</h2>
    <audio controls>
        <source src="./mp3.mp3" type="audio/mp3">
    </audio>


    <section id="register">
        <h2>Register Now</h2>
        <form>
            <label>Name:</label>
            <input type="text" placeholder="Enter your Name" required><br>

            <label>Email:</label>
            <input type="email" placeholder="Enter your Name" required><br>
        </form>
    </section>

<label>
    Select Travk:
    <input list="Track">

    <datalist id="Track">
        <option value="React"></option>
        <option value="Html"></option>
        <option value="Css"></option>
        <option value="Javascript"></option>
    </datalist>
</label>


<section>
    <progress value="50" max="100"></progress>
</section>

<section>
    <meter  value="0.4" min="0" max="1"></meter>
</section>
</body>
</html>
